name: Wrights Disney Iron-On Applique, 5" x 3-1/4", Mickey Mouse

reviews.name: Wrights Disney Iron-On Applique, 5" x 3-1/4", Mickey Mouse
reviews.reviewText: I used this patch on a purse. The only thing is you have to use a wet cloth over top when ironing it on. The patch is velveteen and the velveteen comes off if direct iron is used. Otherwise it is a really cool patch.
reviews.title: nice patch

reviews.name: Wrights Disney Iron-On Applique, 5" x 3-1/4", Mickey Mouse
reviews.reviewText: The Mickey Mouse applique is cute and well made. It is not all sticked, for example the face is material not sticking. It looks good. Joann has sales on this product, however if you are not buying a lot from Joann's the shipping can cost you much more. This new serves is wonderful and handy.
reviews.title: Mickey Mouse Iron On

reviews.name: Wrights Disney Iron-On Applique, 5" x 3-1/4", Mickey Mouse
reviews.reviewText: although it was supposed to be an iron-on, the directions stated to position and sew it on. I took it out of the package and it had the glue on the back and I ironed it on. Worked like a champ. Been washed a couple of times and it still looks great!
reviews.title: TRICKY MICKEY
